# @univerjs-pro/exchange-client

[![npm version](https://img.shields.io/npm/v/@univerjs-pro/exchange-client)](https://npmjs.org/packages/@univerjs-pro/exchange-client)
[![license](https://img.shields.io/npm/l/@univerjs-pro/exchange-client)](https://img.shields.io/npm/l/@univerjs-pro/exchange-client)

## Introduction

The package provides the ability to import and export data between Univer and Excel.

## Usage

### Installation

```shell
npm i @univerjs-pro/exchange-client
```

### Config

```javascript
import { UniverExchangeClientPlugin } from '@univerjs-pro/exchange-client';

univer.registerPlugin(UniverExchangeClientPlugin);
```
